verbs.description: NEW YORK — The data firm at the center of Facebook 's privacy debacle [V: is] closing its doors , according to a published report . Cambridge Analytica has been linked to Donald Trump 's 2016 presidential campaign . The British firm suspended CEO Alexander Tayler in April amid investigations .
